import VR from random import random
r = VR.getRoot().find('Headlight')
if hasattr(VR, 'woods'): VR.woods.destroy() VR.woods = VR.Woods() r.addChild(VR.woods)
def addTree(): t = VR.Tree() #t.setup(4,5,int(random()*100), 0.2,0.4,0.78,0.45, 0.2,0.4,0.2,0.2)
H = 2+random()*6 Nn = int(H)-1 r0 = 0.5+1.5*random() t.addBranching(Nn,4, 0.2,0.4,H,0.1*pow(r0,0), 0.2,0.4,0.2,0.2) t.addBranching(1,4, 0.2,0.4,0.8,0.1*pow(0.45,1), 0.2,0.4,0.2,0.2) t.addBranching(1,4, 0.2,0.4,0.7,0.1*pow(0.45,2), 0.2,0.4,0.2,0.2) t.addBranching(1,4, 0.2,0.4,0.6,0.1*pow(0.45,3), 0.2,0.4,0.2,0.2) t.addBranching(1,4, 0.2,0.4,0.5,0.1*pow(0.45,4), 0.2,0.4,0.2,0.2) t.grow( int(random()*100) )
t.addLeafs(4, 30) t.addLeafs(5, 20) return t
def randPos(W): x = random()*W*2-W z = random()*W*2-W return [x,0,z]
N1 = 5 trees = [ addTree() for i in range(N1) ]
N2 = 2000 for i in range(N2): t = trees[int(random()*N1)] t.setFrom( randPos(50) ) VR.woods.addTree(t)
